highlights: Contributed to building a financial planning website
Worked with the Atlassian tools suite (Jira, BitBucket, Confluence)
Actively participated in all Agile ceremonies
Created components & pages working closely with the design team and configured the API calls in React
Created REST endpoints, and modified the domain model according to business needs in Spring Boot
Built a collaborative music streaming website from the ground up
Implemented the fully-working backend in Spring Boot alone, and incorporated 2FA and endpoint authentication
Contributed to making the frontend in Angular

projects.name: Artif.ai
projects.description: An e-commerce website selling AI-generated art

projects.name: Alcoholometer
projects.description: A mobile application that promotes responsible drinking by calculating BAC levels, warning users of side effects of each BAC level and estimating the time at which they will be sober again.

projects.name: lexia
projects.description: Chrome extension to help dyslexic users browse the web.

projects.name: McGill Course Enroller
projects.description: A microservice that automatically enrolls one in a class when a seat is liberated.

projects.name: Pet adoption website
projects.description: Class project comprising of a backend with authentication features and a frontend - voted best project by my peers

projects.name: Brick Breaker
projects.description: Class project requiring us to design a domain model and use the MVC pattern to implement a Brick Breaker clone - our project was voted best project of the class

projects.name: Circuit Circus
projects.description: Circuit simulator applet made in JavaFX. Users can build circuits using wires, ground, resistors, voltage sources, 2 and 3 gates switches, transistors, diodes, inductors and capacitors. Voted best project by classmates
